show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com , interviews Dr. Andrew Campbell. <!--more--> Dr Campbell trained at the OrlandoRegionalMedicalCenter and completed residency at the Medical College of Georgia.
Dr Campbell is fluent in six different languages: English, French, Spanish, Hungarian, German and Arabic.
He has served as a consultant to the National Institute of Health, National Institute of Dental Research and the CDC.
He is the editor-in-chief of Alternative Therapies in Health and Medicine, and is on the editorial board of medical journals.
Dr Campbell continues to contribute to the advancement of medical science in the fields of immunology and toxicology, focusing on the toxicity of molds, silicone and chemicals with 48 medical journal publications and chapters in medical books over the last two decades.
Dr Campbell has been recognized by Who’s Who in the World for over a decade and is also recognized for this accomplishments and contributions to the science and medicine in Who’s Who in Medicine and Healthcare.
Dr Campbell has been featured on 20/20, The Montel Williams Show, 24 Hour Investigative News and local channels throughout the United States, Canada and Mexico.
He has lectured throughout the world on the effects of molds, silicone and other toxins.
Contact: answerwellness@gmail.com
